title: Understanding Mania
text: Mania is a state characterized by an abnormally elevated mood, increased energy, and activity levels. It is often associated with bipolar disorder.

title: Characteristics of Mania
text: Individuals experiencing mania may exhibit behaviors such as increased talkativeness, decreased need for sleep, and impulsive decision-making.

hintAnswer: condition in which a person’s mood is abnormally elevated and is accompanied by high energy or activity
title: Identifying Mania
text: Which of the following best describes mania?
choices: feelings of sadness and/or loss of interest in activities once considered enjoyable
recurrent illness that involves changes in mood and energy that may be severe and involves both depression and mania, or hypomania
condition in which a person’s mood is abnormally elevated and is accompanied by high energy or activity
Mental health conditions characterized by persistent feelings of sadness, loss of interest in activities, and difficulties in carrying out daily activities
